snippet: The story of the 2012 Toyota RAV4 EV represents the melding of two corporate cultures — one a staid but successful Japanese behemoth, the other, Tesla, the disruptive California start-up — into a single machine.
abstract: Behind the Wheel column review of the 2012 Toyota RAV4 EV.
lead_paragraph: The story of the 2012 Toyota RAV4 EV represents the melding of two corporate cultures — one a staid but successful Japanese behemoth, the other, Tesla, the disruptive California start-up — into a single machine.

headline.seo: With Jolt From Tesla, a More Electrifying Utility
headline.main: With a Jolt From Tesla, a More Electrifying Utility
headline.print_headline: With a Jolt From Tesla, a More Electrifying Utility
